articles.author: Khanyiso Tshwaku
articles.title: Cricket SA posts R221-million loss in Covid-19 hit financial year
articles.description: Cricket South Africa recorded a R221 million loss for the 2022/21 financial year, while finance committee chairperson Mark Rayner said their revenue dropped from R1 billion to R512 million due to Covid's impact on cricket.
articles.content:
• Cricket South Africa recorded an R221-million loss for the 2020/21 financial year.
  • This was announced at their annual general meeting that took place at the Irene Country Club in Pre… [+1678 chars]

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: ECB gives 'conditional' Ashes approval
articles.description: England men's Ashes series in Australia this winter will go ahead "subject to several critical conditions", says the England and Wales Cricket Board.
articles.content:
England men's Ashes series in Australia this winter will go ahead "subject to several critical conditions", says the England and Wales Cricket Board.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
